paper.title: Forecasting the volatility of stock price index
paper.abstract: Accurate volatility forecasting is the core task in the risk management in which various portfolios' pricing, hedging, and option strategies are exercised. Prior studies on stock market have primarily focused on estimation of stock price index by using financial time series models and data mining techniques. This paper proposes hybrid models with neural network and time series models for forecasting the volatility of stock price index in two view points: deviation and direction. It demonstrates the utility of the hybrid model for volatility forecasting.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心研究是股票价格指数的波动性预测，这在金融风险管理中是一个关键任务，用于投资组合的定价、对冲和期权策略。虽然提到了衍生品定价和投资组合管理，但论文的主要焦点是波动性预测，这直接关联到风险管理。
